Compounds
Usage notes
subSections.text: * {{m|ja||なな|tr=nana|pos=see below}} is used instead of {{m|ja||しち|tr=shichi}} in conversation because {{m|ja||しち|tr=shichi}} is considered unlucky. Compare {{m|ja|四|tr=yon, shi}}.
